name: .CYG
summary: Learn about .CYG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a CYG file in Ashampoo 3D CAD Architecture, 3D CAD Professional, or Home Design (Windows). To do so, select the Catalog tab located near the programs' lower right-hand corner and then select the Open file... folder icon. The Open Object file window will appear, allowing you to navigate to and import your CYG file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .cyg file in Ashampoo 3D CAD Professional
images.caption: CYG file open in Ashampoo 3D CAD Professional
